Name: Charge Seal
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Elekid, Electabuzz, and Electivire.  Swap an Electa-Claw and an Electa-Fang for a Charge Seal at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
